title: Meitantei Conan OVA 05: Target wa Kogorou!! Shounen Tanteidan Maruhi Report

synonyms: Meitantei Conan OVA 05: Hyouteki wa Kogorou!! Shounen Tanteidan Maruhi Chousa
alternative_titles.en: Detective Conan OVA 05: The Target is Kogoro! The Detective Boys' Secret Investigation
alternative_titles.ja: 名探偵コナン 標的は小五郎!! 少年探偵団マル秘調査

synopsis:
Conan Edogawa and his classmates are assigned to do a class report about a small business of their choice. After discarding other possible topics, the Detective Boys concludes that it is a perfect opportunity to find out more about Detective Kogorou Mouri's job.

Conan's friends refuse to settle for a simple interview, though, as they want to experience first-hand all the details of his work. Thus, they, along with a reluctant Conan and Ai Haibara, decide to tail the renowned detective for a day. However, the kids soon get involved in a grim situation when Kogorou's current case takes an unexpected and dangerous turn.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
